name: unbox
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to take something out of a box, for example something that you have recently bought or have moved to a different place: We bought the laptop to replace our 5-year-old desktop that we have never unboxed after moving.
More examplesFewer examplesOnline help videos show how to unbox the printer and install it.It took less than 17 minutes for two of us to unbox, rack, power and cable up the Fibre Channel over Ethernet connections.I just moved to a much bigger place and can finally, after 2 years, unbox and organize every last bit of my media. We had to unbox all the games that got packed with the defect.
